Name: Turf Club (1900, Harry Johnson)
Ingredients: 1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe omit for Cocktails Made Easy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Despite the maraschino liqueur, this Martini-style cocktail is dry and punchy.
History: Harry Johnson, tellingly, doesn't list the Turf cocktail in the 1882 first edition or the 1888 second edition of his Bartenders' Manual but does include it as the last drink in his revised 1900 New and Improved edition. Johnson reflects on changing tastes and fashions by calling for Plymouth gin rather than old tom gin in his turn-of-the-century recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Turf Club (1900, Harry Johnson) contains 171 calories
